column1: l. e. phillips| l. e. phillips. born: february 25
column3: 2015 watch the tribute l. e. phillips
column10: tn to the late robert and inez (foster) phillips. mr. phillips owned l. e. phillips paint & body shop and enjoyed fishing in his free time. he was a deacon and sunday school teacher at shiloh baptist church for 42 years. he will be dearly missed by his loving family and friends. survivors include his wife
column14: dale taylor and debbie barrie; 11 grandchildren; 18 great-grandchildren and 3 great-great-grandchildren. the family will receive friends from 6:00 pm until 8:00 pm monday
column16: 2015 in the broadus-raines chapel. funeral services will be held at 10:00 am tuesday
column18: 2015 at shiloh baptist church with rev. charlie hunt
column19: rev. marc swarthout and rev. keith stewart officiating. interment will follow in shiloh cemetery. send sympathy card
